title: Bettycat.cz | Homepage
main.heading: BettyCat Breeding Station
main.subheading: The Perfect Place to Choose a New Pet
main.welcome: Welcome to the website of our family breeding station BettyCat. We are a part of an independent breeding club (NCHK). We fell in love with Ragdolls in 2014, not only for their enchanting appearance but especially for their unique, friendly, and non-conflictive nature.
